data.title: Charles III of Spain
data.text:
August 10, 1759 - December 14, 1788 (29 years) (43-72) May 15, 1734 - October 6, 1759 (25 years) (18-43) Succeeded by Ferdinand I of the Two Sicilies December 29, 1731 - October 3, 1735 (3 years) (15-19) Death November 2, 1742 (2 years) Death March 5, 1749 (5 years) Marriage August 5, 1765 - March 1, 1792 (26 years, widowed) 10.
